text: @maddow @DJChocolateMLK So very sad. All we can do watching from the sidelines is pray that the possible catastrophic surge in Covid-19 cases after carelessly permitting this hate fest to go ahead does not cause the death of any innocent front line workers or family they go home to.🙏🙏🙏
